segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink just gushing water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress are gonna get soaked if she doesn't turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, climbing up to steal cookies without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool; it's tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be a mess with the wet floor and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, reaching up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the adult isn't paying attention to any of this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, water ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, but inside it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a irresponsible scene this is turning into.
segments.speaker: PAR
